Sony FE 135mm f/1.8 GM Camera Lens

The Sony FE 135mm f/1.8 GM Camera Lens is a full-frame, large aperture prime telephoto G Master lens providing outstanding high resolution even at f/1.8 aperture. This pro lens includes dual front and rear XD linear motors to give fast, precise, quiet autofocus. It is also dust & moisture-resistant and has a fluorine-coated front element, so it's ideal for use in all weathers.

Crystal clear image with superb quality, bokeh, and AF

The Sony FE 135mm Camera Lens is a medium telephoto prime, prized for its ability to isolate focus which is characterized by an aesthetic and sophisticated design. Ideal for portrait orientation, this lens also excels in close-range sports shooting and has a unique focal length for landscape subjects. Its G Master design prioritizes both sharpness and bokeh quality and the lens also sports fast autofocus capabilities and durable build quality.

XA and Super ED elements deliver high pixels even at F1.8

The Sony FE 135mm Lens has a floating focus system that works in conjunction with XA (extreme aspherical), Super ED (extra-low dispersion), and ED glass elements precisely deployed in an advanced optical design to effectively correct aberration. This ensures that the highest possible resolution is maintained right out to the image edges throughout the focus range of the lens to deliver a visually stunning experience.

Fast Design and accuracy

This Sony FE 135mm Lens is designed to achieve notably high resolution and sharpness through the correction of a wide variety of spherical and chromatic aberrations. Bright f/1.8 maximum aperture benefits working in difficult lighting conditions and also offers a wealth of control over the focus position when using shallow depth of field techniques. The rounded 11-blade diaphragm contributes to a pleasing bokeh quality when employing selective focus techniques. One XA element is incorporated into the optical design, which features superior surface precision for effective control over astigmatism, field curvature, coma, and other spherical aberrations. Two extra-low dispersion elements, including one Super ED element, are featured in the lens design and help to reduce chromatic aberrations and color fringing for improved clarity and color neutrality. A Nano AR Coating has been applied to reduce surface reflections, flare, and ghosting for increased contrast and color rendering in strong lighting conditions.

Customizable buttons

The Sony FE 135mm Camera Lens has customizable focus hold buttons provided on the side and top surfaces of the lens for easy-to-use and convenient control when shooting in a horizontal or vertical orientation at literally any angle. AF and other functions can be assigned to the focus hold buttons as required.

Dust and moisture resistance provides smooth reliability

To operate reliably in difficult outdoor situations, the dust and moisture resistance design provides the protection needed for different critical atmospheres.

Lightweight, Durable & handy

The Sony FE 135mm Camera lens barrel chassis is constructed in a lightweight and durable manner. The hardness of the alloy helps to maintain optimum precision and reliability, while its lightness helps to maintain overall weight.

Sony FE 28mm f/2 Camera Lens

The Sony FE 28mm Camera Lens is a fantastic choice as a second lens to supplement a basic lens kit, with a bright F2.0 maximum aperture and exceptional overall optical performance. When needed, advanced optics provide outstanding clarity right to the image boundaries as well as a delightfully smooth bokeh. A maximum aperture of F2.0 makes it easier to snap clean shots handled inside or in low light. An inner focus mechanism ensures reliable, silent autofocus operation, which is perfect for both videos and stills. For even more creative possibilities, an optional 21mm Ultra-wide Converter and 16mm Fisheye Converter with complete 180° (diagonally) coverage1 are available.

Prime lens resolution and contrast

The Sony FE 28mm Camera Lens offers advanced fixed focal length optics that efficiently limit aberration from infinity to the closest focusing distance for exceptional clarity throughout the picture area. All lens surfaces are multi-coated to reduce backlighting-induced flare and ghosting for optimal subject clarity and contrast.

Small and light for everyday photography

The Sony FE 28mm Camera Lens's tiny, lightweight form is an excellent complement for compact 7 series bodies. With a weight of only 200 grams, it's a lightweight option for photos and everyday usage, and the aluminum alloy shell offers an exquisite design and a classy feel.

Explore prime lens performance

The Sony FE 28mm Camera Lens is an excellent second lens for full-frame photographers seeking the enhanced clarity and expressive possibilities of a high-performance prime lens. An optical design that combines three aspherical lens elements (one of which is an advanced aspherical element) and two ED elements compress superb optical performance into a small lens, and a brilliant F2.0 maximum aperture facilitates low-light photography.

Dedicated optional converters go wider

Two specialized front converters, available as options, effortlessly increase the angle of vision to 21mm ultra-wide and 16mm fisheye without compromising optical performance or aesthetic attractiveness. When either converter is mounted, a sensor system in the converters and lens guarantees that relevant EXIF data is created for convenient data management.
